components.name: Fastlane CLI
components.description: Command-line interface for user interaction and task initiation

components.name: Backend Services
components.description: Handles task orchestration, CI/CD pipeline management, and notifications

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores user credentials, project configurations, and job metadata

components.name: External Integrations
components.description: Connects to GitHub, Firebase, and other cloud services for automation

data_flows.description: User commands and configuration data sent to backend for processing
Stores job status, credentials, and metadata in persistent storage
Triggers automated workflows with cloud providers and CI/CD systems

trust_boundaries.name: Untrusted CLI
trust_boundaries.description: CLI interface exposed to end-users with potential for malicious input

trust_boundaries.name: Trusted Backend
trust_boundaries.description: Internal services handling sensitive operations and data processing

trust_boundaries.name: External Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Third-party services with potential for API abuse or data leakage
